subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Marc-Andre Fleury stopped 27 shots to tie Tom Barrasso’s franchise record for career shutouts and carry the Pittsburgh Penguins past the visiting Rangers, 2-0, on Tuesday night.
snippet: Marc-Andre Fleury stopped 27 shots to tie Tom Barrasso’s franchise record for career shutouts and carry the Pittsburgh Penguins past the visiting Rangers, 2-0, on Tuesday night.
